title: AccountDetail
description: The response that contains the details for an account.

admin_id.description: The Apple Account of the person who generated the currently in-use tokens.

facilitator_id.description: The legacy equivalent to the admin_id key. This key is deprecated and may not be returned in future responses.

org_id.description: The customer ID. This key is available only in protocol version 3 and later.

org_id_hash.description: The SHA hash of an organization identifier. This helps Mobile Device Management (MDM) server match the hash with the organizationIdHash key in the Client Configuration API. This key is available only in protocol version 3 and later.

org_type.description: The type of organization. Possible values are edu or org. This key is available only in protocol version 3 and later.

org_version.description: Possible values: v1 or v2. v1 is for Apple Deployment Programs (like Device Enrollment Program or Volume Purchase Program) organizations and v2 is for Apple School Manager (ASM) organizations. Currently v2 is applicable only to educational organizations. This key is available only in protocol version 3 and later.

server_name.description: The name of the MDM server.

urls.description: The list of URLs available in the MDM service. This key is valid in X-Server-Protocol-Version 3 and later.
